泉.definition: spring (small stream); mouth of a spring; coin (archaic)

泉山.definition: Quanshan district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

泉山區.definition: Quanshan district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

泉州市.definition: Quanzhou, prefecture-level city in Fujian Province 福建省[Fu2jian4 Sheng3]

泉港.definition: Quangang, a district of Quanzhou City 泉州市[Quan2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

泉港區.definition: Quangang, a district of Quanzhou City 泉州市[Quan2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

泉眼.definition: mouth of a spring or fountain

泉石膏肓.definition: lit. mountain springs and rocks in one's heart (idiom); a deep love of mountain scenery
